entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
